content: * note this is the ad-free printable pdf version of these patterns you can find the free patterns at theturtletrunk com* *a link to each of the video tutorials for these patterns will be added to the pdf on 11/25/2022 you will automatically be sent this update on that date this pdf includes 3 patterns these are 3 mini versions of my original country cottage designs included is the mini country cottage stocking mitten and beanie these are perfect for the holidays use as a gift card holder tree ornament fill with treats or attach to wrapped gifts finished sizes stocking - 5 x 2 5 mitten - 4 x 2 5 beanie - 4 x 2 5 difficulty easy / advanced beginner pattern includes - detailed written instructions - lot s of reference photos - links to video tutorial will be added 11/25/2022 i will send an updated pdf if you purchase before this date supplies needed medium 4 weight yarn 5 00mm h crochet hook yarn needle and scissors
